summary: This is an email chain regarding scheduling in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. It includes a follow-up from May 7, 2021, referencing a conversation the previous day, and a forwarded email from May 3, 2021, containing an attached court order about the trial date.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, referenced in the email subject lines and body.

events.title: Scheduling follow-up email
events.description: An email is sent following up on a conversation from the previous day regarding scheduling conflicts and an upcoming letter to the court.

events.title: Trial order email forwarded
events.description: An email is sent forwarding an attached court order regarding the trial date in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations.name: One Saint Andrew's Plaza

locations.name: New York, NY

keyFacts: The document is correspondence related to the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (docket 20 Cr. 330).
It indicates active legal scheduling and communication between parties (likely defense and prosecution) in May 2021 regarding the trial.
An attached court order concerning the trial date was circulated on May 3, 2021.
A letter to the court regarding scheduling was due on the Monday following May 7, 2021.
